1594360.name: War on Mars
1594360.description:
War on Mars


Have you ever dreamed of becoming the commander of an expedition to Mars? War on Mars is a 2.5D RTS game in which you have to play the role of a captain who is in command of a whole war battalion. You may ask why the war battalion? As it turned out, Mars is not a planet without living souls. It is inhabited by bloodthirsty beasts, with which communication is almost a miracle. Nevertheless, these creatures do not enjoy the presence of other species. They hate everyone. That is why your battalion has become an intruder whom the beasts will absolutely want to annihilate. Your task is simple - make your battalion survive and eliminate the bloodthirsty beasts.

As a commander, you will be responsible for:
  • Economics management
  • Creation of a defense infrastructure
  • Creation of combat units
  • Upgrading Units
  • Using combat skills
  • Leading humanity to victory

War on Mars is not only a campaign mode, but also fierce online combat. Compete against players from all over the world. Show your command skills and prove to the world that you are a world-class commander.

Play online or locally against AI. You can choose 2 races:

People:

You manage workers who dig minerals on the surface, thanks to which you can build various types of buildings. Through military infrastructure, you can create infantry, tanks, planes, and even nuclear weapons. A trait of people is their stubbornness to occupy as many lands as possible. Using modern defense turrets, it is possible to defend previously looted areas. With the help of the laboratory, you can upgrade your units during combat to increase their endurance, strength and speed. They may even possess new powers.
